description.last_approved_text: Due to fears for his health, Liu Bian was raised away from the capital by the famed Taoist, Shi Zimiao, earning him the nickname 'Lord Shi'.

description.last_approved_text: Always plotting, always scheming, always something beneath the obvious. Always.

description.last_approved_text: Fu Xie is not only a general of no little repute – the scourge of the Yellow Turbans, perhaps – but also a skilled writer.

description.last_approved_text: An up-and-coming young mind, of which great things are expected.

description.last_approved_text: Burrowing under tree and hill, no defences are a match for the mind of a determined sapper.

ceo_nodes.description: Burrowing under tree and hill, no defences are a match for the mind of a determined sapper.

description.last_approved_text: "Do I know the He? Oh yes, we go waaaaay back. I could tell you stories..."

description.last_approved_text: Many battles – and many lives – have passed before the eyes of this grizzled bandit.

description.last_approved_text: The axe that cleaves through beast can so easily be turned to rend man too.

description.last_approved_text: This one's unwavering loyalty is matched only by their demure nature.

description.last_approved_text: Not all that glitters is gold. Sometimes, talent shines even brighter.

description.last_approved_text: Even the morningsong that drifts on the wind cannot compare to the sweet lyric of the muse.

description.last_approved_text: The south produces boons to its nobles: two daughters, fair of mind and strong of resolve.

description.last_approved_text: To support one another, through both the fruitful times and the barren, is the essence of marriage.

ceo_nodes.description: To support one another, through both the fruitful times and the barren, is the essence of marriage.

description.last_approved_text: To the filial and the devout, life will give not one, but two measures of its respect.

description.last_approved_text: Warning: Keep away from fire.
The machete serves a versatile purpose. It is good for cutting down both thicket and warrior alike.

ceo_nodes.description: The machete serves a versatile purpose. It is good for cutting down both thicket and warrior alike.
ceo_nodes.title: Machete

description.last_approved_text: Flint casts a distinctive, alluring vision – not that it matters when embedding in someone's skull.

ceo_nodes.description: Flint casts a distinctive, alluring vision – not that it matters when embedding in someone's skull.
ceo_nodes.title: Twin-flint Weapons

description.last_approved_text: They say a weapon needs a name, but why? Would that make it more deadly?

ceo_nodes.description: They say a weapon needs a name, but why? Would that make it more deadly?
ceo_nodes.title: King Wutugu's Two-handed Axe

description.last_approved_text: The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.

ceo_nodes.description: The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.
ceo_nodes.title: Li Ru's Armour

description.last_approved_text: The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.

ceo_nodes.description: The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.
ceo_nodes.title: Wei Yan's Armour

description.last_approved_text: The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.

ceo_nodes.description: The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.
ceo_nodes.title: Xun You's Armour

description.last_approved_text: From hidden spots and concealed ambushes, the strikes rise furiously from the earth.

ceo_nodes.description: From hidden spots and concealed ambushes, the strikes rise furiously from the earth.
ceo_nodes.title: Marshall of the Third Cave

description.last_approved_text: Ahuinan will summon the very valleys to war against invaders, tearing apart the earth in his rage.

ceo_nodes.description: Ahuinan will summon the very valleys to war against invaders, tearing apart the earth in his rage.
ceo_nodes.title: Lord of the Mountains

description.last_approved_text: Where the power of the valleys meet, there you will find Ahuinan, poised to direct that strength.

ceo_nodes.description: Where the power of the valleys meet, there you will find Ahuinan, poised to direct that strength.
ceo_nodes.title: Chief of the Three Ravines

description.last_approved_text: A keen mind and an observant eye can decide battles before any order is spoken.

ceo_nodes.description: A keen mind and an observant eye can decide battles before any order is spoken.
ceo_nodes.title: The Cunning Youth

description.last_approved_text: To live in the shadow of a powerful sibling is not so bad if you too are touched by greatness.

ceo_nodes.description: To live in the shadow of a powerful sibling is not so bad if you too are touched by greatness.
ceo_nodes.title: The Brother of Flames

description.last_approved_text: Battlefield cunning may not guarantee victory, but it certainly does not hinder it.

ceo_nodes.description: Battlefield cunning may not guarantee victory, but it certainly does not hinder it.
ceo_nodes.title: The Astute Tactician

description.last_approved_text: Military fervour and ancestral zeal fuel a dedicated warrior!

ceo_nodes.description: Military fervour and ancestral zeal fuel a dedicated warrior!
ceo_nodes.title: Commander of the Left

description.last_approved_text: One does not need to be the greatest warrior to prove their worth and their dedication.

ceo_nodes.description: One does not need to be the greatest warrior to prove their worth and their dedication.
ceo_nodes.title: The Distinguished Strength

description.last_approved_text: No punishment can hold Dongtuna back, not even a hundred lashes of the rod upon his back.

ceo_nodes.description: No punishment can hold Dongtuna back, not even a hundred lashes of the rod upon his back.
ceo_nodes.title: The Enduring Mountain

description.last_approved_text: To them, their lord is everything - leader of all the tribes.

ceo_nodes.description: To them, their lord is everything - leader of all the tribes.
ceo_nodes.title: Loyal Lieutenant

description.last_approved_text: The valleys are sacred, they are home; Jinhuansanjie would see them defended.

ceo_nodes.description: The valleys are sacred, they are home; Jinhuansanjie would see them defended.
ceo_nodes.title: Guarder of the Path

description.last_approved_text: When every battle may be your last, there are no lengths to which you will not go.

ceo_nodes.description: When every battle may be your last, there are no lengths to which you will not go.
ceo_nodes.title: The Would-be Martyr

description.last_approved_text: A life spent at war has given Duosi an overbearingly – he would say justified – distrusting temperament.

ceo_nodes.description: A life spent at war has given Duosi an overbearingly – he would say justified – distrusting temperament.
ceo_nodes.title: The Superstitious Warrior

description.last_approved_text: Duosi is as mighty as the highest peaks, but as reserved as the densest forest.

ceo_nodes.description: Duosi is as mighty as the highest peaks, but as reserved as the densest forest.
ceo_nodes.title: The Solitary Mountain

description.last_approved_text: What is there to know that Duosi does not already know?

ceo_nodes.description: What is there to know that Duosi does not already know?
ceo_nodes.title: The Wisest Chief

description.last_approved_text: What power Meng Huo has is born of physical prowess and ceaseless determination both.

ceo_nodes.description: What power Meng Huo has is born of physical prowess and ceaseless determination both.
ceo_nodes.title: The Stubborn Ox

description.last_approved_text: If Meng Huo was not meant to reach for greatness, why give him the power to do so?

ceo_nodes.description: If Meng Huo was not meant to reach for greatness, why give him the power to do so?
ceo_nodes.title: The Ambitious Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: If there is another who could rule, they have yet to demonstrate a greater claim than Meng Huo.

ceo_nodes.description: If there is another who could rule, they have yet to demonstrate a greater claim than Meng Huo.
ceo_nodes.title: King of the Man

description.last_approved_text: When the earth speaks, Mulu hears, then enacts nature's will.

ceo_nodes.description: When the earth speaks, Mulu hears, then enacts nature's will.
ceo_nodes.title: The Mystic Lord

description.last_approved_text: Mulu is said to draw his strength from mystical, magic properties used to repel his enemies.

ceo_nodes.description: Mulu is said to draw his strength from mystical, magic properties used to repel his enemies.
ceo_nodes.title: The Enigma of the Valleys

description.last_approved_text: The chief of the ravine leads his warriors to war for his causes, as he sees fit.

ceo_nodes.description: The chief of the ravine leads his warriors to war for his causes, as he sees fit.
ceo_nodes.title: Chief of Bana Ravine

description.last_approved_text: Shamoke brooks no resistance to his rule, showing mercy to his tribes and destruction to his enemies.

ceo_nodes.description: Shamoke brooks no resistance to his rule, showing mercy to his tribes and destruction to his enemies.
ceo_nodes.title: Ruler of the Five Valleys

description.last_approved_text: With his face aflame and his eyes cruor-red, Shamoke's presence strikes terror into all.

ceo_nodes.description: With his face aflame and his eyes cruor-red, Shamoke's presence strikes terror into all.
ceo_nodes.title: The Blood-Shot Lord

description.last_approved_text: Despite his appearance, Shamoke is possessed of an inquisitive, incisive wit.

ceo_nodes.description: Despite his appearance, Shamoke is possessed of an inquisitive, incisive wit.
ceo_nodes.title: Sharp-minded

description.last_approved_text: Who could want a tame and comfortable land when one such as ours breeds the toughest warriors!?

ceo_nodes.description: Who could want a tame and comfortable land when one such as ours breeds the toughest warriors!?
ceo_nodes.title: Wuguo Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: Barbarians, some call us. A 'civilised' man who hasn’t the belly for a fight is no man at all!

ceo_nodes.description: Barbarians, some call us. A 'civilised' man who hasn’t the belly for a fight is no man at all!
ceo_nodes.title: Nanman Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: I have made the Nanman great – for to be a warrior there is no greater honour.

ceo_nodes.description: I have made the Nanman great – for to be a warrior there is no greater honour.
ceo_nodes.title: Grand Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: The inaction of so many others drives Zhurong ever, ever forward.

ceo_nodes.description: The inaction of so many others drives Zhurong ever, ever forward.
ceo_nodes.title: Irrepressible Fire

description.last_approved_text: The fires of ancestry smoulder within her – she will not see them snuffed out!

ceo_nodes.description: The fires of ancestry smoulder within her – she will not see them snuffed out!
ceo_nodes.title: Received of the Cinder

description.last_approved_text: Whether truly the kin of a goddess or not, Zhurong nevertheless fights with a super-human tenacity.

ceo_nodes.description: Whether truly the kin of a goddess or not, Zhurong nevertheless fights with a super-human tenacity.
ceo_nodes.title: Descended of the Flames

description.last_approved_text: A lifetime having the ear of leaders have positioned Mangyachang perfectly to ascend.

ceo_nodes.description: A lifetime having the ear of leaders have positioned Mangyachang perfectly to ascend.
ceo_nodes.title: The Ready Ruler

description.last_approved_text: One does not achieve the title of second-in-command without proving martial prowess time and again.

ceo_nodes.description: One does not achieve the title of second-in-command without proving martial prowess time and again.
ceo_nodes.title: Peerless Commander

description.last_approved_text: Mangyachang executes his leader's will with a zealous, ruthless efficiency.

ceo_nodes.description: Mangyachang executes his leader's will with a zealous, ruthless efficiency.
ceo_nodes.title: The Loyal Subordinate

description.last_approved_text: Although we all tread the path of war, we must too believe in the paths of peace.

ceo_nodes.description: Although we all tread the path of war, we must too believe in the paths of peace.
ceo_nodes.title: Believer in Peace

description.last_approved_text: Does sacrificing one's ideals and ones ancestry make one learned? Perhaps!

ceo_nodes.description: Does sacrificing one's ideals and ones ancestry make one learned? Perhaps!
ceo_nodes.title: The Sophisticated Tribesmen

description.last_approved_text: Knowledge is not wisdom, and true intelligence is finding the points where they intersect…

ceo_nodes.description: Knowledge is not wisdom, and true intelligence is finding the points where they intersect…
ceo_nodes.title: The Learned One

description.last_approved_text: Meng You, once set upon a path, will invariably see it through to whatever conclusion.

ceo_nodes.description: Meng You, once set upon a path, will invariably see it through to whatever conclusion.
ceo_nodes.title: Bull-headed Fighter

description.last_approved_text: War comes as naturally as drawing breath to some.

ceo_nodes.description: War comes as naturally as drawing breath to some.
ceo_nodes.title: The Little Warmaker

description.last_approved_text: For his tribe and his kin, Meng You will throw himself into the very jaws of death.

ceo_nodes.description: For his tribe and his kin, Meng You will throw himself into the very jaws of death.
ceo_nodes.title: The Dependable Sibling

description.last_approved_text: Tu An will pursue his victory up to, and even past, the point of reason.

ceo_nodes.description: Tu An will pursue his victory up to, and even past, the point of reason.
ceo_nodes.title: The Vicious Victor

description.last_approved_text: What victories Tu An earns, he will persist with and build upon.

ceo_nodes.description: What victories Tu An earns, he will persist with and build upon.
ceo_nodes.title: Eager Tactician

description.last_approved_text: Tu An is poised to fight, and eagerly awaits any and all opportunity.

ceo_nodes.description: Tu An is poised to fight, and eagerly awaits any and all opportunity.
ceo_nodes.title: War-Waiting General

description.last_approved_text: You can be assured that Xi Ni will never give up, even if his pursuit leads to destruction.

ceo_nodes.description: You can be assured that Xi Ni will never give up, even if his pursuit leads to destruction.
ceo_nodes.title: The Relentless

description.last_approved_text: Xi Ni is poised for war, and has been all his life.

ceo_nodes.description: Xi Ni is poised for war, and has been all his life.
ceo_nodes.title: The Waiting Warrior

description.last_approved_text: Some men are bred for war; Xi Ni is such a man.

ceo_nodes.description: Some men are bred for war; Xi Ni is such a man.
ceo_nodes.title: The Stalwart

description.last_approved_text: Yang Feng masters all he sees - and his sight is voracious indeed.

ceo_nodes.description: Yang Feng masters all he sees - and his sight is voracious indeed.
ceo_nodes.title: Master of the Twenty-one Ravines

description.last_approved_text: Yang Feng is loyal to his tribe and his leader… until his own safety is jeopardised.

ceo_nodes.description: Yang Feng is loyal to his tribe and his leader… until his own safety is jeopardised.
ceo_nodes.title: The Indulgent

description.last_approved_text: Yang Feng has ambitions; desires he will see realised, one way or another.

ceo_nodes.description: Yang Feng has ambitions; desires he will see realised, one way or another.
ceo_nodes.title: The Ever-reaching

Proud warriors of the south, natives and determined people, resisting encroaching invaders.

ceo_nodes.description: Proud warriors of the south, natives and determined people, resisting encroaching invaders.
ceo_nodes.title: Southern Bulwark

description.last_approved_text: If one does not know the way through these passes they will surely suffer misfortune.

ceo_nodes.description: If one does not know the way through these passes they will surely suffer misfortune.
ceo_nodes.title: The Sage's Fealty

description.last_approved_text: The tribes of the Man were always upfront and loyal to a fault.

ceo_nodes.description: The tribes of the Man were always upfront and loyal to a fault.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of the Man

description.last_approved_text: Once one understands beasts, they can control them.

ceo_nodes.description: Once one understands beasts, they can control them.
ceo_nodes.title: Loyalty of the Beasts

description.last_approved_text: All that you see before you... this is the land of the five valleys.

ceo_nodes.description: All that you see before you... this is the land of the five valleys.
ceo_nodes.title: Lord of the Five Valleys

description.last_approved_text: Never having been pierced, the rattan's armour can weather even the harshest of blows.

ceo_nodes.description: Never having been pierced, the rattan's armour can weather even the harshest of blows.
ceo_nodes.title: The Rattan Army

description.last_approved_text: These are the flames not so easily doused.

ceo_nodes.description: These are the flames not so easily doused.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of the Fire People

description.last_approved_text: A keen mind is more deadly than any blade.

ceo_nodes.description: A keen mind is more deadly than any blade.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Yang Feng

description.last_approved_text: Skill at arms is a valuable trait for any tribal chief.

ceo_nodes.description: Skill at arms is a valuable trait for any tribal chief.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Ahuinan

description.last_approved_text: A generous nature and a fierce martial prowess make for an excellent warrior.

ceo_nodes.description: A generous nature and a fierce martial prowess make for an excellent warrior.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Dongtuna

description.last_approved_text: The land provides, maybe here more than anywhere else.

ceo_nodes.description: The land provides, maybe here more than anywhere else.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Jiangyang

description.last_approved_text: A stunning site to behold; proud and resplendent.

ceo_nodes.description: A stunning site to behold; proud and resplendent.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Jianning

description.last_approved_text: To stack a stone, no matter how small, is its own defiant act of might.

ceo_nodes.description: To stack a stone, no matter how small, is its own defiant act of might.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Jiaozhi

description.last_approved_text: To fight despite hardship, and maintain a benevolent soul – this is true strength.

ceo_nodes.description: To fight despite hardship, and maintain a benevolent soul – this is true strength.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Jinhuansanjie

description.last_approved_text: The charge of the Ox is beyond the power of any warrior.

ceo_nodes.description: The charge of the Ox is beyond the power of any warrior.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Mangyachang

description.last_approved_text: A disordered mind is a ruinous thing; martial order is essential.

ceo_nodes.description: A disordered mind is a ruinous thing; martial order is essential.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Tu An

description.last_approved_text: When every path and bush are known to you, the land itself becomes your spear and shield.

ceo_nodes.description: When every path and bush are known to you, the land itself becomes your spear and shield.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Xi Ni

description.last_approved_text: Let they who find their footing on this violent earth inherit it.

ceo_nodes.description: Let they who find their footing on this violent earth inherit it.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Yongchang

description.last_approved_text: May true leadership still the once-placid lakes of this patient land.

ceo_nodes.description: May true leadership still the once-placid lakes of this patient land.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Yunnan

description.last_approved_text: Treat the land with love and respect and it will return such kindnesses to you tenfold.

ceo_nodes.description: Treat the land with love and respect and it will return such kindnesses to you tenfold.
ceo_nodes.title: Fealty of Zangke

description.last_approved_text: The dragon brings wealth, success and prosperity.

ceo_nodes.description: The dragon brings wealth, success and prosperity.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Dragon

description.last_approved_text: From the glint of an eagle's eye it sees all the lands arrayed below it.

ceo_nodes.description: From the glint of an eagle's eye it sees all the lands arrayed below it.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Eagle

description.last_approved_text: Be like the elephant, who remembers all and learns from their past.

ceo_nodes.description: Be like the elephant, who remembers all and learns from their past.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Elephant

description.last_approved_text: The water flows, and the fish flows with it, its destination never in doubt.

ceo_nodes.description: The water flows, and the fish flows with it, its destination never in doubt.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Fish

description.last_approved_text: The goat never loses balance, and is sure-footed on even the greatest precipice.

ceo_nodes.description: The goat never loses balance, and is sure-footed on even the greatest precipice.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Goat

description.last_approved_text: If it is intelligence you seek, you should observe the monkey, the most cunning of all creatures.

ceo_nodes.description: If it is intelligence you seek, you should observe the monkey, the most cunning of all creatures.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Monkey

description.last_approved_text: The ox toils hard in the field, and shows the value of dedication.

ceo_nodes.description: The ox toils hard in the field, and shows the value of dedication.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Ox

description.last_approved_text: Be invisible, like the tiger, who stalks its prey with practiced ease.

ceo_nodes.description: Be invisible, like the tiger, who stalks its prey with practiced ease.
ceo_nodes.title: Ritual of the Tiger

description.last_approved_text: Although eager to show their prowess, this general is nevertheless relatively new to war.

ceo_nodes.description: Although eager to show their prowess, this general is nevertheless relatively new to war.
ceo_nodes.title: Novice Commander

description.last_approved_text: Although they have much yet to learn, this commander has begun to earn their scars in battle.

ceo_nodes.description: Although they have much yet to learn, this commander has begun to earn their scars in battle.
ceo_nodes.title: Capable Commander

description.last_approved_text: What is there to know of war that this one does not already know? Very little, it seems!

ceo_nodes.description: What is there to know of war that this one does not already know? Very little, it seems!
ceo_nodes.title: Adept Commander

description.last_approved_text: To govern is to know many things, and this one knows only the basics, so far.

ceo_nodes.description: To govern is to know many things, and this one knows only the basics, so far.
ceo_nodes.title: Fledgling Administrator

description.last_approved_text: Given time and investment, they will become a most capable leader. They are already on their way.

ceo_nodes.description: Given time and investment, they will become a most capable leader. They are already on their way.
ceo_nodes.title: Competent Administrator

description.last_approved_text: If governance is an art, then the city is a canvas, and this one a true painter.

ceo_nodes.description: If governance is an art, then the city is a canvas, and this one a true painter.
ceo_nodes.title: Seasoned Administrator

description.last_approved_text: They may fumble their coin more often than not, but they have a budding eye for value and prudence.

ceo_nodes.description: They may fumble their coin more often than not, but they have a budding eye for value and prudence.
ceo_nodes.title: Beginner Coinmaster

description.last_approved_text: The counting of coin is no fool's errand, and it is certain that this one is no fool.

ceo_nodes.description: The counting of coin is no fool's errand, and it is certain that this one is no fool.
ceo_nodes.title: Versed Coinmaster

description.last_approved_text: The master of all they survey, and they mostly survey money.

ceo_nodes.description: The master of all they survey, and they mostly survey money.
ceo_nodes.title: Scrupulous Coinmaster

description.last_approved_text: Whilst this one has a love for animals, they are thoroughly unversed in their ways.

ceo_nodes.description: Whilst this one has a love for animals, they are thoroughly unversed in their ways.
ceo_nodes.title: Fresh Tamer

description.last_approved_text: A whipcrack is no longer required to bring these beasts to heel.

ceo_nodes.description: A whipcrack is no longer required to bring these beasts to heel.
ceo_nodes.title: Professional Tamer

description.last_approved_text: The crack of the whip and the cry of battle sends beasts to war at their master's command.

ceo_nodes.description: The crack of the whip and the cry of battle sends beasts to war at their master's command.
ceo_nodes.title: Fearsome Tamer

description.last_approved_text: This one tries at war, but has yet to find much success. Give it time, however…

ceo_nodes.description: This one tries at war, but has yet to find much success. Give it time, however…
ceo_nodes.title: Amateur General

description.last_approved_text: War is to them as breathing is to others; natural and necessary.

ceo_nodes.description: War is to them as breathing is to others; natural and necessary.
ceo_nodes.title: Professional General

description.last_approved_text: That which others would call horrendous, is but a day's work to this general.

ceo_nodes.description: That which others would call horrendous, is but a day's work to this general.
ceo_nodes.title: Brutal General

description.last_approved_text: Eager and skilled are not common aquaintances. Yet in time, the two can become the same.

ceo_nodes.description: Eager and skilled are not common aquaintances. Yet in time, the two can become the same.
ceo_nodes.title: Newcomer Warrior

description.last_approved_text: You put a weapon in their hand, they will use it, and use it well.

ceo_nodes.description: You put a weapon in their hand, they will use it, and use it well.
ceo_nodes.title: Skilled Warrior

description.last_approved_text: One fighter after another lines up to be felled by their superior, transcendental skill.

ceo_nodes.description: One fighter after another lines up to be felled by their superior, transcendental skill.
ceo_nodes.title: Extraordinary Warrior

description.last_approved_text: Subterfuge and deception begin in the most basic of acts, then rage like fire…

ceo_nodes.description: Subterfuge and deception begin in the most basic of acts, then rage like fire…
ceo_nodes.title: Sneaky Chief

description.last_approved_text: Beware their words, for they do not always carry the meaning you would wish…

ceo_nodes.description: Beware their words, for they do not always carry the meaning you would wish…
ceo_nodes.title: Cunning Chief

description.last_approved_text: Their ways drip sweet like honey, yet conceal the poison blade amongst the saccharine talk.

ceo_nodes.description: Their ways drip sweet like honey, yet conceal the poison blade amongst the saccharine talk.
ceo_nodes.title: Insidious Chief

description.last_approved_text: Although ready to govern, there is a world of knowledge they yet need to know.

ceo_nodes.description: Although ready to govern, there is a world of knowledge they yet need to know.
ceo_nodes.title: Untested Official

description.last_approved_text: If it is within their power, they will do it, for the benefit of the people.

ceo_nodes.description: If it is within their power, they will do it, for the benefit of the people.
ceo_nodes.title: Accommodating Official

description.last_approved_text: Those with both power and good intent can do wonderful things should they succeed in keeping evil thoughts at bay...

ceo_nodes.description: Those with both power and good intent can do wonderful things should they succeed in keeping evil thoughts at bay...
ceo_nodes.title: Magnanimous Official

description.last_approved_text: A coin not spent is a coin saved, they always say.

ceo_nodes.description: A coin not spent is a coin saved, they always say.
ceo_nodes.title: Thrifty Leader

description.last_approved_text: It is known that as a leader, a valuable skill is conjuring something from nothing.

ceo_nodes.description: It is known that as a leader, a valuable skill is conjuring something from nothing.
ceo_nodes.title: Resourceful Leader

description.last_approved_text: What can be sourced by this leader is then shared with their people; that is true leadership.

ceo_nodes.description: What can be sourced by this leader is then shared with their people; that is true leadership.
ceo_nodes.title: Providing Leader

description.last_approved_text: The ways of governance are known to them, in theory. In practice, however…

ceo_nodes.description: The ways of governance are known to them, in theory. In practice, however…
ceo_nodes.title: Untried Bureaucrat

description.last_approved_text: Time and experience have turned this once-green would-be into a skilled manager of affairs.

ceo_nodes.description: Time and experience have turned this once-green would-be into a skilled manager of affairs.

description.last_approved_text: A shrewd, keen eye lends itself well to the business of governing, and managing economic interests.

ceo_nodes.description: A shrewd, keen eye lends itself well to the business of governing, and managing economic interests.
ceo_nodes.title: Economical Bureaucrat

description.last_approved_text: To maintain the household. That is their job. Nothing more.

ceo_nodes.description: To maintain the household. That is their job. Nothing more.
ceo_nodes.title: Basic Steward

description.last_approved_text: As a steward gains in experience, so too do their responsibilities over the estate they manage.

ceo_nodes.description: As a steward gains in experience, so too do their responsibilities over the estate they manage.

description.last_approved_text: Such is the steward's skill, that they essentially own the estate in lieu of the true lord of the land.

ceo_nodes.description: Such is the steward's skill, that they essentially own the estate in lieu of the true lord of the land.
ceo_nodes.title: Veteran Steward

description.last_approved_text: To be chieftain is to command respect, and this chief... barely does.

ceo_nodes.description: To be chieftain is to command respect, and this chief... barely does.
ceo_nodes.title: Novice Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: This chieftain has endured not through luck or favour, but a skill all their own.

ceo_nodes.description: This chieftain has endured not through luck or favour, but a skill all their own.
ceo_nodes.title: Skilled Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: Strength defines a true chief, and strength also defines this one.

ceo_nodes.description: Strength defines a true chief, and strength also defines this one.
ceo_nodes.title: Powerful Chieftain

description.last_approved_text: The will to protect is often far stronger than the actual ability to do so.

ceo_nodes.description: The will to protect is often far stronger than the actual ability to do so.

description.last_approved_text: Time, effort, and many battles, has made this one a resilient wall against foes.

ceo_nodes.description: Time, effort, and many battles, has made this one a resilient wall against foes.

description.last_approved_text: They move for no-one.
They have a smattering of elemental strategy, but no more.

ceo_nodes.description: They have a smattering of elemental strategy, but no more.
ceo_nodes.title: Initiate Commander

description.last_approved_text: Study and patience, and more than a few defeats, have given this commander a greater knowledge of war.

ceo_nodes.description: Study and patience, and more than a few defeats, have given this commander a greater knowledge of war.

description.last_approved_text: They are the very model of a modern major general.

ceo_nodes.description: They are the very model of a modern major general.
ceo_nodes.title: Artful Commander

description.last_approved_text: What they lack in quantifiable experience they make up for with sheer enthusiasm.

ceo_nodes.description: What they lack in quantifiable experience they make up for with sheer enthusiasm.
ceo_nodes.title: Eager Leader

description.last_approved_text: Once their mind is made up, it can be staggeringly difficult to alter their course.

ceo_nodes.description: Once their mind is made up, it can be staggeringly difficult to alter their course.

description.last_approved_text: War is their business, and business – it seems – is good.

ceo_nodes.description: War is their business, and business – it seems – is good.
ceo_nodes.title: Masterful Leader

description.last_approved_text: They have much to learn. But with an abundance of time – and the right tutelage – they could be a contender for greatness.

ceo_nodes.description: They have much to learn. But with an abundance of time – and the right tutelage – they could be a contender for greatness.

ceo_nodes.description: To manage people is to know people. And to know people is the work of many hard years.

description.last_approved_text: They have come far because they worked at it, being generous where they could, and ruthless when they needed to be.

ceo_nodes.description: They have come far because they worked at it, being generous where they could, and ruthless when they needed to be.
ceo_nodes.title: Superior Executive

description.last_approved_text: If they lack anything in skill – and it is not to say they do – then it is compensated greatly by pure verve.

ceo_nodes.description: If they lack anything in skill – and it is not to say they do – then it is compensated greatly by pure verve.

description.last_approved_text: Years of war have worn this one's mercy down to all but nothing – brutal, unrelenting fury follows their charge.

ceo_nodes.description: Years of war have worn this one's mercy down to all but nothing – brutal, unrelenting fury follows their charge.

ceo_nodes.description: The fight is all that matters – if their life is to be forfeit, so be it!

description.last_approved_text: This person performs acts of compassion far beyond what is expected of mere etiquette, proving that their heart and deeds are genuine.

description.last_approved_text: Respect earned from kindness has deep roots, whereas that forced from fear lives on shifting sands.

description.last_approved_text: This person can find a use for things others would discard without thinking, so nothing is wasted.

description.last_approved_text: This one believes that to be rich and powerful at the expense of their soul is a fool’s deal, and unworthy of consideration.

description.last_approved_text: By putting others before themselves, this one achieves peace and humility, acting as an example to us all.

description.last_approved_text: This one affects ignorance to small misdemeanours, as a little dipping into the pot every now and then keeps the peace.

ceo_nodes.description: This one affects ignorance to small misdemeanours, as a little dipping into the pot every now and then keeps the peace.
ceo_nodes.title: Tolerant

description.last_approved_text: This one is as calm as a still lake; their thoughts possess a mindful clarity and they perform their tasks all the better for it.

ceo_nodes.description: This one is as calm as a still lake; their thoughts possess a mindful clarity and they perform their tasks all the better for it.

ceo_nodes.description: When others are lost, it is this one’s advice they seek out first.

description.last_approved_text: Like an arrow, this one is ever-moving towards one goal, sweeping up many others in their wake.

ceo_nodes.description: Like an arrow, this one is ever-moving towards one goal, sweeping up many others in their wake.

description.last_approved_text: Whenever tragedy strikes, this one remains untroubled and acts as an anchor for others with reason and clear thinking.

ceo_nodes.description: Whenever tragedy strikes, this one remains untroubled and acts as an anchor for others with reason and clear thinking.

description.last_approved_text: True courage comes from refusing to let fear paralyse you from righteous action, not in denying you feel it to save face.

ceo_nodes.description: True courage comes from refusing to let fear paralyse you from righteous action, not in denying you feel it to save face.

description.last_approved_text: This person has few belongings and refuses luxuries to be free of material concerns and focus on the needs of others.

ceo_nodes.description: This person has few belongings and refuses luxuries to be free of material concerns and focus on the needs of others.

description.last_approved_text: "Show me a warrior that can match my strength and I shall exchange my sword and steed for a spade and plough!"

ceo_nodes.description: "Show me a warrior that can match my strength and I shall exchange my sword and steed for a spade and plough!"

description.last_approved_text: Harmony comes from accepting things as they are; seeking change within the natural order instead of forcing it.

ceo_nodes.description: Harmony comes from accepting things as they are; seeking change within the natural order instead of forcing it.

ceo_nodes.description: Many speak highly of this person, for they are a pleasure to be around and conversation with them is effortless.

description.last_approved_text: It is easy to be cynical, but this one remains open to beauty and hope and their optimism is infectious.
